videos.title: Alone in Patagonia
videos.description:
Color graded with my EnduraGrade PowerGrades & LUTs: http://www.enduragrade.com

The idea of traveling solo through Patagonia always felt a little intimidating. Not because I didn‚Äôt want to go‚Äîbut because I wasn‚Äôt sure how I‚Äôd handle being truly alone. No one to laugh with, no one to share the view, just me, the road, and my camera.

In this cinematic travel film, I take you with me through southern Patagonia‚Äîfrom the iconic granite horns of Torres del Paine National Park in Chile, to the jagged spires of Mount Fitz Roy in El Chalt√©n, Argentina. 

Whether you‚Äôre planning your own trip to Patagonia, dreaming of solo travel adventures, or just here for the views‚ÄîI hope this story helps you feel a little more okay with not having all the answers. Thanks for being here.

--

Filmed solo on the Sony FX3.

videos.title: My Solo Trip to Iceland
videos.description:
Color graded with my EnduraGrade PowerGrades & LUTs: http://www.enduragrade.com

I didn‚Äôt come to Iceland with a big plan - just a van, a camera, and the hope that this would be an adventure to remember.

In this cinematic solo travel film, I take you on a week-long journey through Iceland‚Äôs ever-changing landscape. From glacier lagoons and volcanic highlands to puffin cliffs and the world‚Äôs loneliest house in the Westman Islands, this was a trip about more than just capturing beautiful visuals. It was a personal checkpoint. A chance to slow down, reconnect with photography with the Sony A7R V, and reflect on where I‚Äôve been - and where I‚Äôm going.

Along the way, I revisited familiar places like Vestrahorn and Skogafoss, explored hidden gems like Sig√∂lduglj√∫fur (the Valley of Tears), and experienced the surreal beauty of Langisj√≥r from the sky.

Filmed solo on the Sony FX3.

videos.title: Incredible Bikepacking Adventure Through Peru!
videos.description:
Cordilleras Blanca and Huayuash in the Peruvian Andes are a mighty fine place to go cycling.  In July 2024 we spent four weeks bikepacking two loops - one in the Cordillera Blanca and one in the Cordillera Huayuash of Peru.  We only slept below 3,000m on two occasions, crossing many  4,000m + passes - the highest at just under 4,900m (16,000ft).  We camped under snow capped peaks, hiked our bikes up breath taking hills and rode descents that lasted for hours.

If you like this film from Peru, please like, subscribe or comment.  Thanks.

Taken From Blue Planet II 
This bold cinematic experience takes viewers on a magical adventure across the greatest, yet least known, parts of our planet ‚Äì our oceans. Since Blue Planet aired in 2001, our understanding of life beneath the waves has completely changed. Travelling from the icy polar seas to the vibrant blues of the coral atolls, this series shares these astonishing new discoveries. Meet the strange octopuses lurking in the depths of the Antarctic Ocean. Watch giant trevally fish leap to catch birds in mid-air. And ride on the back of a hammerhead shark as it attacks. Inspiring awe and wonder, Blue Planet II reveals surprising new places, charismatic new characters and extraordinary new behaviours.

Thousands of years ago, people set sail into the unknown ‚Äî across 5,000 km of open ocean ‚Äî and found a new world.

videos.title: UNREAL PLACES - The Most Unbelievable Wonders of Planet Earth
videos.description:
Let's explore the most amazing man-made and natural wonders of our Planet Earth. In this thrilling documentary we will take you on an adventure around the planet, uncovering the most beautiful places that exist on our green planet. 

Let's delve into the exploration of awe-inspiring landscapes, including majestic mountains, tumbling waterfalls, expansive glaciers, secret caves, erupting volcanoes, geological craters and canyons, the diverse marine life of underwater worlds, and lush jungles.

We will visit over 150 different locations in this FREE 4k documentary including: Old Man of Storr, Cappadocia, Grand Canyon, Valle de la Luna, Mount Fanjing Temple, Valley of the Baobabs, Lencois Maranhenses, Faroe Islands, Banff National Park, Amazon Rainforest, Matterhorn, Petra, Richat Structure, Monument Valley, Lake Natron, Greenland, Petrified Forest, Waitomo Caves, Death Valley, Moorea, Cliffs of Moher, Nusa Penida, Yosemite, Sahara Desert, Ice Hotel, Angel Falls, Antarctice, Deadvlei, and many many more!

videos.title: PATAGONIA: The Bottom of the World | 4K Travel Documentary
videos.description:
At the southern edge of South America lies a land like no other.
Patagonia stretches across Argentina and Chile, from the windswept plains of the Atlantic to the glacier-carved fjords of the Pacific. 

In this documentary, we travel across the last frontier of the Americas ‚Äî through Tierra del Fuego, Torres del Paine, and the Perito Moreno Glacier.

Join us on a journey through the bottom of the world.

videos.title: Alaska Adventure | 8000 Mile Motorcycle Road Trip | Documentary
videos.description:
Join me on this once in a lifetime Alaska Adventure, as I fulfill a life long dream of riding my Kawasaki Versys 650 motorcycle 8,000 miles, from my home in California to Alaska and back. Ride along with me for 32 days of epic roads, beautiful scenery, remote camping, and crazy weather as I set out to attempt the most difficult ride of my life. Will broken chains, worn down tires, closed roads, and over 20 days of rain stop me from completing my goal? See what it is like to live on the road with me in this 2 hour and 52 minute Alaska Adventure Documentary.
